Role of the Finance Minister of India

Without any doubt the Finance Minister of India is having one of the highest sanction and condition in Indian government . He is responsible for okaying all the decisions of the Ministry of Finance. "><font color="red">Finance Management</font></a>.</b>

The finance minister of India along with the other military officers and executives in the section, work towards the success of the area. Farther, the ontogeny and growth of the fiscal market places of India have been sped by the Indian Economic policy which was mustered in and stuck in in the early 1990s. Other than wording the Wedlock budget, the finance minister of India with the financial ministry is also responsible for giving voice the essential policies that are advantageous for the growth of Indian economy .

The finance ministry of India governs several institutions of the area and some of the major establishments have been named below :.
Central Banks.
Insurance companies including all the life as well as non life insurance agencies.
Com mercial Banks.
Specialized fiscal establishments such as NHB, SIDBI, NABARD, BIFR, and EXIM bank.
Securities and Exchange Board India (SEBI).
Credit Ratings offices such as ICRA and CRISIL.
Insurance Regulatory Authority of India (IRDA).
Various Functions of the Finance Minister of India :.

The finance minister of India performs several purposes all together for the benefit of Indian citizens and the Indian companies and businesses . He is responsible for pursuing bodies of work :.
Makes the Union Budget.
Orders of payment the Acts and Rules.
Controls the financial institutions.
Garners the Revenue.
Influences the Capital Markets.
Allocates and controls the center and state finances in India.
Modulate and determine the Foreign Investments a well as the Foreign Investments Promotion Board (FIP.
